code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Form,Button,Container,Card}from'react-bootstrap';import api from'../../axiosConfig';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({username:'',email:'',password:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await api.post('/auth/signup',formData);alert('User registered successfully!');}catch(error){console.error('Error signing up:',error);alert('Error signing up!');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"p-4 mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:"Signup"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{controlId:"formUsername",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{children:"Username"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter username",name:"username",value:formData.username,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{controlId:"formEmail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"email",placeholder:"Enter email",name:"email",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{controlId:"formPassword",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"password",placeholder:"Enter password",name:"password",value:formData.password,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",type:"submit",children:"Signup"})]})]})});};export default Signup;
